BINGO_CARD.title: Build your own bingo cards
BINGO_CARD.description: Design your own personal bingo cards. You can specify the grid size along with many other aspects such as border and background color, and if the center square should be free or not. Give it a go and see it for yourself.

BINGO_GAME.title: Play a game
BINGO_GAME.description: Organize a fun bingo game with your friends. You can set the desired date and time for the game and send your friends an invite link. There a two games settings you can play manual or fully automatic. Give it a shot.

CONFIRM_STOP.title: Are you sure you want to stop this game?
CONFIRM_STOP.description: If you stop this game there will be no winner and you are forced to start a new game
